root.name: Magical Chase
root.description: OverviewAs a broom-wielding witch searching for an evil wizard you collect money to buy power-ups and extra lives. Along the way you encounter unfriendly porcupines and giant teddy bears.The game features three difficulty levels, including "breeze", "bumpy", and "rough". To unlock every level, players must complete the game on the "rough" difficulty.Critical ReceptionElectronic Gaming Monthly issued the scores of 7,7,7,7 adding, "...a decent shooter with a really strange premise and background. Although you're operating without potions and shields, the quality and pace of the blaster action is up-to-par with the majority of titles on the market ".RarityReleased late in the TurboGrafx-16's life cycle, Magical Chase is considered to be one of the harder to find games on the system. Even the Gameboy Color and PC ports are considered to be rare.
